extendedInfo.description: "myChildren's" â Your Guide to Nationwide Children's HospitalmyChildren's, Nationwide Children's Hospitalâs FREE app, provides access to our main campus and offsite locations, wayfinding, physician and service information and more. This app provides simple navigation throughout the hospital main campus as well as door to door directions to our over 50 locations - finding your way has never been easier. In addition, you'll have quick access to physician, service and need-to-know information.Highlights/Key Features:Locate: The nearest Urgent Care Center, Emergency Room at the hospitalâs main campus, Close To Home Center, and more.Find a Doctor or Service: Search for your childâs doctor by name, program or service. View their profile, contact them or find them on the map.Health Library: Access an A-Z listing of critical childhood health topics, from stages of growth and development to disease and injury prevention, procedures and tests.My Child: Customized section for your child(ren) - immunization schedules, developmental milestones, and more.Need-to-Know Information: Get hours, service descriptions, information about what to bring and what not to bring and general main campus information.Nationwide Children's in Columbus, Ohio is a premier pediatric hospital and research institute. In 2012, after the largest pediatric construction endeavor in the nation, we will be the second largest pediatric hospital in the country. Visit www.nationwidechildrens.org to learn more.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: For those of you giving bad reviews maybe you should read what the application provides before you start complaining about what you can\'t find in the application
reviews.author: Kaneadsha Jones

reviews.title: Can\'t even lookup appointments!
reviews.comment: I installed this app so I could check appointments and prescriptions like on other hospitals My Charts apps.  Apparently it does neither making it nearly useless.
reviews.author: A Person

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: Love how user friendly this app is to navigate. I\'ll use this often for my family and friends.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Awesome app NCH!  Thank you for continuing to inform us and keep us as connected as possible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ease of use
reviews.comment: So easy to find what I wanted. Great help for the urgent care info.
reviews.author: A Google User
